## Recovery Bay Summary

::: {style="font-size: 1rem;"}
Total Number of Hours for All Recovery Bays in a Hospital from 37^th^ to 40^th^ weeks
:::

```{r}
library(plotly)

source("~/src/script/recovery_wards/04_durations_by_bay.R")

pl <- get_duration_pl("~/src/data/final/2024-05-21/recovery/durations_37-40_v2_8.rds")

ggplotly(pl)
```
